about @chiacrafts hey fellow crocheters i m chiara pronounced kiara - i mitalian thegirlbehindtheinstagram account@chiacrafts in 2019 i was in search of a hobby somethingtokeepmy brain busy and fill up my free time i remembered being fascinated by some crochet pokémons i saw online so lacking other ideas i decided to give that a try i bought some inexpensive cotton a set of hooks and i taught myselfthebasicsofcrochetbywatchingyoutubevideos fast forward to this day not onlyhaveiimprovedsomuch asacrocheter buti veevencreatedmanydesigns myown designs when writing a crochet pattern my goal is to make them interesting and engaging i d like each patterntofeellikea mini adventure with a fresh element to learn never trivial and always surprising although they may be challenging my aim is to provide the best possible support and guidancetomakeitafunandrewardingexperience funfact sincethen i veworkedonmanyprojects butihaven tmadeanypokémonyetxd cheers chiara 2 crochet pattern by chiara chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs row guidelines when working in row you create a 2d shape proceeding zig-zag at the end of each row you make a turning chain turn yourworkandproceed before you dive into the pattern let sdotthei s in theoppositedirection workingthefirststitchof andcrossthet s… thenewrowinthelaststitchofthepreviousrow make sure to read the whole document first it will help you stay focused and avoid any surprisesalongtheway also take a good look at all the pictures and compare them with yourworkasyougo having a visual reference will help you make sure you reontherighttrack rounds remember practice makes improvement so takeyourtimeandhavefunwithit when working in rounds you create a 3d hollow shape there are two types of rounds joined
